Author: taw345272
Text: Thank you, I completely forgot how round my face was for 6 months constantly. Now my face is way slimmer, even though I gained so I guess my body recovered lol. But my mind is like: letâ€™s restrict again. Ahhh, the brilliant ED logic.

Author: tianh-tia
Text: during recovery, most ppl tend to retain more food and water weight as their body isnt fully adjusted yet, so during recovery you may tend to feel like you gained more than you actually did
